original_title: I Like This Queer Scene But I’ve Slept With Both of Them
overview: I Like This Queer Scene… suggests the cinematic tropes of the coming of age movie, only to abruptly end after 90 seconds, it‘s truncated length analogous to the limits of the ‘small town queer scene’ it depicts.
title: I Like This Queer Scene But I’ve Slept With Both of Them
